title: Fps Drops
body:
Since the last yesterday I have been having huge fps drops from 160 to 20 in a mather of seconds. It's hard to play with these constant drops. 
League is the only game I have been having these issues. Somebody please help!!!{{champion:32}} {{champion:32}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} {{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: Heya, this could be some extra strain caused by Snowdown.  What happens if you disable snowdown assets for the map via in-game options?
Even without snowdown my fps constantly drops. And the only app im using that isn't league is discord. Do u think I should reinstall league to see if it solves the issue?? Thanks for the reply btw.

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=nEFZrA6O,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-16T21:51:15.321+0000)
>
> Heya, this could be some extra strain caused by Snowdown.  What happens if you disable snowdown assets for the map via in-game options?

I've had the same issue. The game now runs like a stop-motion animation or a powerpoint slide show. I tried repairing the client, disabling snowdown, lowering settings, and nothing has worked. The game is literally unplayable right now :/

Don't worry we'll figure this out.  Are you running any third party applications that may interfere with League?  Firstly, I recommend going through the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your drivers are up to date.

It may also be worth trying a [Clean Boot](https://support.gaijin.net/hc/en-us/articles/200070041-How-To-Perform-a-Clean-Boot-PC-MAC-) and slowly loading up programs to see if a specific one is causing problems with the game.

I dont think I have any programs running that weren't running before this patch. I have maybe discord/overwolf? COuld those be causing it?

nope, my 980m 2x sli gpu's sink to 20fps after 30 minutes of gameplay
i submitted a ticket with a video and everything, even tho the blitzcrank bot said my ticket was done, i requested a human.
a 980m alone should not hit 20FPS in the game.

i play ds3 at 60fps on ultra just fine, battle field just fine, witcher on ultra fine.
Riot this is on your end somewhere pals please fix.
Why not just admit its riot's side thats causing it since theres so many of us having the same issue
Just entered the game and the fps drop dissapeared :D ty for everyone who commented
